item.title: WANdisco Fusion Set up and Installation Guide
item.description: WANdisco Fusion Set up and Installation Guide # Overview # This quickstart will help in setting up the Azure Linux Virtual Machine (VM) suitable for the WANdisco Fusion installation. Below will be covered: Azure Linux Virtual Machine (VM) creation using Azure Portal Configuration set up and Installation guide for WANdisco Fusion Prerequisites # Active Azure Subscription Azure Data Lake Storage Gen1
